scripts.dev: vite build --mode development && cp -r ./plugins/mud ./assets/scripts/ && cp -r ./plugins/mud-dev ./assets/scripts/ && cp -r ./plugins/particle ./assets/scripts/ && cp -r ./plugins/ethers ./assets/scripts/
scripts.deploy:testnet: rm -rf ./assets/scripts/mud && rm -rf ./assets/scripts/mud.meta && rm -rf ./assets/scripts/mud-dev && rm -rf ./assets/scripts/mud-dev.meta && rm -rf ./assets/scripts/ethers && rm -rf ./assets/scripts/ethers.meta && rm -rf ./assets/scripts/particle && rm -rf ./assets/scripts/particle.meta && vite build --mode testnet && cp -r ./plugins/mud ./build/web-mobile/ && cp -r ./plugins/mud-dev ./build/web-mobile/ && cp -r ./plugins/particle ./build/web-mobile/ && cp -r ./plugins/ethers ./build/web-mobile/
